thread.title: Interactive: Red Sox - Yankees Rivalry Close Over Last Decade
thread.title_full: Interactive: Red Sox - Yankees Rivalry Close Over Last Decade - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Interactive: Red Sox - Yankees Rivalry Close Over Last Decade
text:
Since the 2006 season, the New York Yankees have beaten the Boston Red Sox eight more times than they've lost in regular-season games, including the Yankees' 4-1 victory on Thursday that clinched a wild-card seat.
That's a pretty good rivalry, all things considered.
And even though the rivalry has see-sawed over the years, the Yankees' dominance in the 1920s and 1930s has put the all-time tally on the Yankees' side.
